entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: SSE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain overnight. Freezing rain over southern sections in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
